definition: colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: There are some doubters even in the western villages.
sentences.chinese: 就是在西邊的村落裏也有一些懷疑者。

sentences.english: Incarnated one of your favorite heroes from naruto in a battle to defend you village.
sentences.chinese: 從火影忍者中挑出您最喜愛的英雄，保衛你的村落。

sentences.english: The lonely Ewok set out on a journey to find another village.
sentences.chinese: 這位孤獨的伊渥克人啓程去尋找另一個村落。

sentences.english: But in Changle down the south.
sentences.chinese: 但是在長樂卻有一個村落。

sentences.english: Tuskarr mainly care about fishing, whaling and protecting their villages.
sentences.chinese: 圖斯卡人基本上只關心捕魚，捕鯨和保衛他們的村落。

sentences.english: Kaiping Diaolou and villages have stepped into the cultural vision of the world.
sentences.chinese: 開平碉樓與村落，已經走進了全人類的文化視野。

sentences.english: All seemed quiet in the coastal village of Taba.
sentences.chinese: 在塔巴這座海岸村落，一切似乎都很安靜。

sentences.english: Staggered the same path in the field, between the villages can hear the voice of the crow like dogs.
sentences.chinese: 田間小路交錯相通，村落間能聽到雞鳴狗叫的聲音。

sentences.english: A little hamlet, whose roofs were blent with trees, straggled up the side of these hills.
sentences.chinese: 房頂和樹摻雜著的小村落，散佈在山的一邊。

sentences.english: His house is in the village though.
After unpacking, we meet up for a walk to an abandoned Indian village.
sentences.chinese: 放下行李，我們步行來到一個廢棄的印地安村落。

sentences.english: Pingfen also arranges for the collection of handicrafts from other nearby villages.
sentences.chinese: 此外，她還要到附近的村落收集工藝品。

sentences.english: Taiwanese woman in an indigenous village opens up a recycling station.
sentences.chinese: 原住民村落的臺灣婦人爲環保站努力。

sentences.english: The river wanders through beautiful country.
sentences.chinese: 那河蜿蜒流過漂亮的村落。

sentences.english: Mail comes to this remote village only once a week.
sentences.chinese: 郵車每週只到這個偏偏僻的村落一主。

sentences.english: The old villages of Huizhou have characteristic greatly.
